title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 §§ 130-2.3 - Payment of sanctions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 §§ 130-2.3 - Payment of sanctions

State Regulations

Payments of sanctions shall be deposited
with the Lawyers' Fund for Client Protection established pursuant to section
97-t
of the

State Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
§§
130-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
